div.p: GREAT TIME TO READ THE LINCOLN, KENNEDY AND JESUS BOOKS, FINAL
TIP OF THE DAY, FIRST UP, HAPPY VALENTINE’S DAY.
HAVE SOME FUN SECOND, WE’LL BE IN LOS ANGELES NEXT WEEK CAUSING
TROUBLE. WE GO OUT THERE EVERY YEAR
BEFORE MORE PEOPLE WATCH THE FACTOR IN CALIFORNIA THAN ANY
OTHER STATE IN THE UNION, AND WE WOULD LIKE TO RECOGNIZE THAT.
ANYWAY, IN L.A. TODAY IT WAS 78 DEGREES.
IN NEW YORK, THERE IS A FOOT AND A HALF OF SNOW.
SO HERE IS THE TIP, WHEN YOU HAVE A CHOICE BETWEEN SUNNY AND
WARM AS OPPOSED TO ICY AND FREEZING, TAKE THE HEAT, SO TO
SPEAK, THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT.
PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX WEBSITE WHICH IS DIFFERENT FROM
